Why UniPay?

We invest in students who invest in their education.

What we offer
  • Reduced Rates
  • Loan Application
  • Financial Support
  • Alumni Support

Reduced
Rates

Our mission is to financially support you and for us that means saving you money. We offer rates that cut the global average.

Loan
Application

When assessing your eligibility, we don’t just look at your credit. We look at the whole pie. By assessing data points that predict your growth potential after university, we can better suit your needs.

Financial
Support

We want you succeed. To help when it matters most, in a big or small way.

Alumni
Support

We bring on the best to help you fund your study abroad. Behind your loan is a community of alumni from your university that wants to help you.

WHAT ARE OUR DIFFERENTIATORS?

We Redefine Finance

Your growth is our priority, with tailored solutions, financial empowerment, and a network of support.

  • Holistic Perspective

    We understand you are at an early point in your career. To make sure our assessment of your potential is fair, we look at your all around potential.

  • Financial Support

    By supporting you we hope to make you feel you belong here. Being a member of UniPay we'll support you during your time in the U.S.

  • Community Driven

    We care about you. And so do others. That's why we bring on supporters of your university to form a community driven lending system.

Turn ambition into opportunity

Join us in supporting student success.

Faq for students

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Can UniPay help me access financial support?

    Yes! Once approved, UniPay provides financial support tailored to the needs of our members.

  • What are my options as an international student?

    Interest rates and loan terms depend on your financial background. Most lenders require a cosigner for international student loans, but UniPay offers options to help you navigate these challenges.

  • How can I learn more about UniPay and financial resources?

    Explore our platform for in-depth resources on studying in the U.S., or connect with us on social media for tips, updates, and support.
